Contributor: Leyendecker, J. C., 1874-1951, artist.; United States. Fuel Administration, publisher.; Edwards & Deutsch Litho. Co., lithographer.;
Note: Signed  "J.C. Leyendecker." Date based on America's participation in the war. "No. 2," appears on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to order coal now. Illustration shows a man on a horse and wagon.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
